permissions: Admins and broker org admins can update business unit memberships. Business unit managers can update memberships only when setting kind to technician or general.
side_effects: Updates the business unit membership record.
validation_notes: The business unit membership ID argument is required. --kind must be provided and cannot be empty. kind must be one of: manager, technician, general. business-unit and membership relationships are create-only and cannot be changed after creation.

flags.name: --kind
flags.validation: Required for update; one of: manager, technician, general.
